plot: Two young children escape the clutches of the North Korean army and make their way southward as beggars to find their lost parents.
title: Nunmuleorin baljaguk
plot_es: Two young children escape the clutches of the North Korean army and make their way southward as beggars to find their lost parents.
plot_en: Two young children escape the clutches of the North Korean army and make their way southward as beggars to find their lost parents.
